name: BugOCalypse
description:
*Click on Screen to enable Audio*

Survive This BUG Apocalypse

The bugs are attracted to light . Use the gun provided to defend yourself!

Good Luck:)

HOW TO PLAY:

USE ARROW KEYS TO MOVE LEFT OR RIGHT

USE SPACE TO JUMP

USE Z key TO SHOOT THE BUGS

Send screenshots of your quickest survival, here's mine:
